article_title: Comedian gives Trump a British accent in viral video
article_text:
British comedian Peter Serafinowicz is giving Republican presidential front-runner Donald Trump Donald TrumpCarson rooting for Trump, Sanders debate Developer rejects Trump’s Keystone pipeline proposal Trump take victory lap over rivals' remarks MORE a more “sophisticated” tone.

ADVERTISEMENT

Serafinowicz dubbed himself over footage of the billionaire real estate mogul talking about Hillary Clinton on Fox News.

The comedian shared the video, titled “Sophisticated Trump,” on YouTube and Twitter.

“What if Donald Trump had elocution lessons?” he asked in the video’s description.

Watch the video above.
